OneD, Koch Modular partner to scale up silicon-graphite EV anode materialsOneD Battery Sciences and Koch Modular said on Wednesday they have teamed up to build a factory in North America to produce enough silicon-graphite anode material to supply batteries for around 1 million EVs annually. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 14:03:29 GMT V3CGSGZTQ5JJ5HAIYEQYZ4WBWY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/oned-koch-modular-partner-scale-up-silicon-graphite-ev-anode-materials-2024-01-17/Nick Carey商业汽车与交通
On visit to Ireland, Chinese premier eyes deeper economic tiesChina would like to deepen economic and trade cooperation with Ireland, particularly in areas of "huge potential" such as green technologies and the digital economy, Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday during a trip to Dublin. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 13:36:51 GMT 3OE4EZDEAVPC7HDXYM3JPGMDYE https://www.reuters.com/world/visit-ireland-chinese-premier-eyes-deeper-economic-ties-2024-01-17/Reuters世界
India rejects iron ore miner NMDC's proposal for China exports -sourcesIndia's government has turned down a request from state-owned iron ore miner NMDC Ltd to export its ore to China, the world's largest iron ore consumer, three sources with direct knowledge said. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:35:16 GMT ASZ35CQXR5OFLHMRR2NZDLQDTM https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/india-rejects-iron-ore-miner-nmdcs-proposal-china-exports-sources-2024-01-17/Neha Arora市场商品
Philippines defence minister calls out China official for "gutter-level talk"The Philippines' defense secretary on Wednesday accused a Chinese foreign ministry official of insulting President Ferdinand Marcos Jr during a news briefing, stooping to what he called "low and gutter-level talk." Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:25:25 GMT NHRR6F3YPBKQBOVGCAVSJBICRM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-defence-minister-calls-out-china-official-gutter-level-talk-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区

Exclusive: BYD to stop making pouch batteries for its hybrid EVs on leakage concernsChina's BYD plans to end production of the pouch-type batteries used in its best-selling hybrids as the automaker seeks to address durability concerns and the risk that they could leak, said three people familiar with the matter. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:10:19 GMT A7I43LGGBRNTLHH7SHXYKKLT7E https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/byd-stop-making-pouch-batteries-its-hybrid-evs-leakage-concerns-sources-2024-01-17/Reuters商业汽车与交通
